title: viLaiyADa mayilum uNDu
sahitya:
viLaiyADa mayilum uNDu (kandan) endan vinai tIrkkum karamum uNDu


anupallavi

  alaiyAgum kaDalOram amarar magan uNDu (veNN-) nI azhagAga kulavi vara (kandA) aDavi magaL vaLLiyuNDu


caraNam   jnAnam uraittiDavE (brahma) shivAnArin seviyuNdu tAnum amrndiDavE tAyArin maDiyuNDu
taniyAgi ninriDavE malaiyuNDu vEluNDu dinam undanai pADa nAnuNDu bhataruNDu
